abstract: Toyota Motor Company will temporarily stop selling and building eight models for the U.S. market while it tries to resolve a problem with accelerator pedals.
snippet: Toyota Motor Company will temporarily stop selling and building eight models for the U.S. market while it tries to resolve a problem with accelerator pedals.
lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor, still struggling to resolve a problem with accelerator pedals, said Tuesday that it would temporarily stop building and selling eight models, including the popular Camry and Corolla sedans, in the North American market.

headline.main: Toyota Halts Sales of 8 Models in U.S. for Pedal Flaw
headline.print_headline: Toyota Halting Most Car Sales For Pedal Flaw
